channel.title: ROGALSKI Adam on ECTHRwatch

item.title: Email sent to Messrs. Rogalski (Assistant Legal Attaché, U.S. Department of State, F.B.I.) and Manjarrez (F.B.I.)
item.description: DRAFT On 2022-03-11, I sent 3 emails to the F.B.I. This is the first email which was sent at 19:38 Beijing time. It was sent to Messrs. Rogalski and Manjarrez.

item.title: Email sent to Messrs. Rogalski (Assistant Legal Attaché, U.S. Department of State, F.B.I.) and Manjarrez (F.B.I.)
item.description: DRAFT On 2022-03-11, I sent 3 emails to the F.B.I. This is the second email which was sent at 16:36 Beijing time. It was sent to Messrs. Rogalski and Manjarrez. It’s about the XiJinping.fr and LiKeqiang.org websites.

item.title: Email sent to Messrs. Rogalski (Assistant Legal Attaché, U.S. Department of State, F.B.I.) and Manjarrez (F.B.I.)
item.description: DRAFT On 2022-03-11, I sent 3 emails to the F.B.I. This is the first email which was sent at 15:32 Beijing time. It was sent to Messrs. Rogalski and Manjarrez.

item.title: Adam ROGALSKI
item.description: Adam Rogalski Federal Bureau of Investigation Assistant Legal Attaché My communications to Mr. Rogalski are published on Adam-Rogalski.Federal-Bureau-of-Investigation.com.

item.title: Answer sent to Messrs. Rogalski (Assistant Legal Attaché, U.S. Department of State, F.B.I.) and Manjarrez (F.B.I.)
item.description:
FROM : [Whistle-blower’s email address]

TO : [Mr. Rogalski’s username]@state.gov

TO : [Mr. Manjarrez’s username]@fbi.gov

Answer sent by email to Messrs. Rogalski and Manjarrez on October 05, 2021, at 01:20 (am) Beijing time.
